channel.title: [PI] Custom item issue!

item.title: [PI] Custom item issue!
item.dc:creator: @master_laake master laake
item.description:
@master_laake wrote:

I have the custom items added and looks good in inv works no lag but when i equip it wont show on player i have correct item ints, with correct .dat files! there are the 2 ints of my most recent items! please help!

case 20089:
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.modelid = 62769;
itemDef.modelZoom = 2000;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 500;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 0;
itemDef.anInt204 = 14;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -6;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1;
itemDef.anInt165 = 62768;
itemDef.anInt200 = 62768;
itemDef.name = “Donator Cape”;
break;

case 20090:
itemDef.modelid = 10247;
itemDef.name = “Abyssal vine whip”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 848;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 324;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 1808;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56;
itemDef.stackable = false;
itemDef.anInt165 = 10253;
itemDef.anInt200 = 10253;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.itemActions[2] = “Split”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
break;
